00007 // The delay is added to prevent buffer overrun
00008 // The variadic (va_) stuff is magic 
00009 //void serial_out(const char *fmt, ...)
00010 void serial_out(const char *fmt, ...)
00011 {
00012         va_list arg;
00013         va_start(arg, fmt);
00014         if(usart0_transmit_buffer_inuse_count() > ((2*USART0_TRANSMIT_BUFFER_LEN)/3)) delay(BUFFER_DELAY);
00015         vprintf(fmt, arg);
00016         va_end(arg);
00017 }
